definition: everybody/everyone/we all
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
see 大夫[dai4 fu5]
meals (abbr. for 伙食[huo3 shi2])/variant of 夥|伙[huo3]
companion/partner/group/classifier for groups of people/to combine/together
erhua variant of 大伙[da4 huo3]

sentences.english: One member of the commission dissented from the rest on two important matters.
sentences.chinese: 委员会中的一名在两件重大事情上与大伙产生异议。

sentences.english: The sky rains and lightnings, they are scared and run immediately.
sentences.chinese: 天空立即落起大雨，而且行雷闪电，大伙儿立即。

sentences.english: People would have laughed at me… a cellar rat selling real estate.
sentences.chinese: 大伙儿会笑话我的，一只住地下室的耗子卖房地产。

sentences.english: I'll go and pick us some grapefruits .
I think mass frugality would be good for the economy.
sentences.chinese: 我认为大伙都过节俭的生活才对经济有利。

sentences.english: Mazel tov to the bride and groom.
Based on the scheduling principle of Dahuofang reservoir, we set up an integrated flood regulation system in Hun basin.
sentences.chinese: 建立了以大伙房水库为中心的浑河流域防洪调度系统。

sentences.english: After some discussion, they all trooped out of the cave and started a march on Landlord Wang's home.
sentences.chinese: 经过一番讨论后，大伙儿涌出窑洞，朝着王常盈家冲。

sentences.english: Please bring two to three great dishes to share.
sentences.chinese: 请每家带两三道拿手好菜，大伙共享佳淆。

sentences.english: Unbeknown to everybody, Rachel is apparently the pregnant one.
sentences.chinese: 大伙不知道的是，瑞秋才是怀孕的人。

sentences.english: When we met in the street the houses had grown somber.
sentences.chinese: 大伙儿在街上碰头时，四周的房子都已黯淡下来。

sentences.english: I definitely wouldn't wear my trousers low to work, but it's the way we all dress for social gatherings.
sentences.chinese: 我肯定不会穿成这样去上班，但聚会时大伙都这么穿。

sentences.english: Most of us know what pleasure Ernie got from your article.
sentences.chinese: 我们大伙知道，厄尼从你的文章中获得无穷的快乐。

sentences.english: The veteran worker ranks high in public love and esteem.
sentences.chinese: 那位老工人深受大伙的爱戴。

sentences.english: We all pitched in to buy this gift .
sentences.chinese: 这是我们大伙凑钱给您买的礼物。

definition: erhua variant of 大伙[da4 huo3]
everyone/influential family/great expert
brothers/comrades/men/brethren
I or me/we (including both the speaker and the person spoken to)
variant of 咱[zan2]
see 咱[zan2]
variant of 咱[zan2]
we or us (including both the speaker and the person(s) spoken to)/(dialect) I or me/(dialect) (in a coaxing or familiar way) you/also pr. [za2 men5]
I (northern dialects)
dialectal equivalent of 什麼|什么[shen2 me5]/also pr. [sha4]
everybody/all (guests, colleagues etc)/all of you
anyway/in any case/to come over from the enemy's side
you (plural)
happy/glad/willing (to do sth)/in a cheerful mood
subordinates in gang of bandits
(final particle equivalent to 了[le5])/(particle calling attention to, or mildly warning of, a situation)
two (colloquial equivalent of 兩個|两个)/both/some
leader
here
modal particle indicating that sth is obvious/particle indicating a pause for emphasis
